name: TreeListy Self-Tree v1.5
description:
**Lens Selection**
- Primary: Capability (What can I do?)
- Secondary: Gap (What's missing?)
- Tertiary: Meta (Is self-tree process improving?)

**Build:** 700
**Date:** 2026-01-03
**Evidence Standard:** v1.5 (automated measurement + gap detection)

children.name: Measured Signals
children.description:
Automated measurements from Build 700
Last run: 2026-01-03T07:42:43.672Z

items.name: File Metrics
items.description:
**4.42 MB | 93,770 lines** [MEASURED]

Single-file architecture maintained.
- Growth: +32% since Build 543
- Method: fs.statSync + line count

items.name: Unit Tests
items.description:

- Method: npm run test:unit

children.name: Now / Next / Later
children.description:
Execution-forcing structure.

**Rule:** If "Now" is empty, the self-tree failed its purpose.

items.name: Now (This Week)
items.description: Max 3 items. Each has acceptance test.

subtasks.name: 1. Update Self-Tree to v1.5
subtasks.description:
**Status:** In Progress
**Acceptance Test:** Self-tree reflects Build 700 measurements.

- [x] Create measurement script
- [x] Run measurements
- [ ] Generate v1.5 tree
- [ ] Import and verify
- [ ] Commit to repo

subtasks.name: 2. Verify Feature Documentation
subtasks.description:
**Status:** In Progress
**Acceptance Test:** All documented features pass live tests.

- [x] Create verify-features-v2.py
- [x] Run 37 tests (all pass)
- [ ] Add TreeBeard command tests
- [ ] Add mobile viewport tests

subtasks.name: 3. Fix Command Count Measurement
subtasks.description:
**Status:** Pending
**Acceptance Test:** Script correctly reports 120+ commands.

Current issue: COMMAND_REGISTRY regex only finding 1 entry.
Need to fix pattern matching in measure-self-tree.js.

items.name: Next (This Month)
items.description: Max 5 items. Pending validation.

subtasks.name: 1. Whisper API Integration
subtasks.description:
**Hypothesis:** Whisper will produce better transcripts than Web Speech API.
[SPECULATED] [ADAPTABLE]

Plan exists: docs/plans/whisper-api-integration.md
**Blocks:** Nothing currently blocked.

subtasks.name: 2. Self-Tree Auto-Update
subtasks.description:
**Hypothesis:** Automated weekly measurement updates will keep self-tree fresh.
[SPECULATED] [ADAPTABLE]

**Validation:** Run for 4 weeks, check accuracy.

subtasks.name: 3. TreeBeard Telemetry Dashboard
subtasks.description:
**Hypothesis:** Seeing command usage will inform priorities.
[SPECULATED]

**Prerequisite:** getToolUseTelemetry() already in place.

items.name: Later
items.description: Parking lot, not priority.

subtasks.name: Multi-Tree Workspaces
subtasks.description: Open multiple trees in tabs. Requires architecture changes.

children.name: Meta: Self-Tree Process
children.description: How well is the self-tree process working?

items.name: Freshness
items.description:
**v1.4 was 157 builds stale** [MEASURED]

Gap: Build 543 → Build 700 = 157 builds undocumented.
Root cause: Manual update process.
Fix: Automated measurement script (implemented).

items.name: Actionability
items.description:
**Now/Next/Later structure forces execution** [OBSERVED]

v1.4 had good structure but stale content.
v1.5 adds automated signals to ensure accuracy.

items.name: Bootstrapping Value
items.description:
**Self-tree enables AI context injection** [HYPOTHESIS]

When Claude Code reads self-tree:
- Understands current capabilities
- Knows what's implemented vs planned
- Can make informed development decisions

**Validation:** Track time-to-productivity for new sessions.

children.name: Architecture Quick Reference
children.description: Key facts for AI development context

items.name: Single-File Structure
items.description:
**treeplexity.html** (~4.4MB)

- HTML: ~2,000 lines
- CSS: ~10,000 lines
- JavaScript: ~80,000+ lines

All patterns, AI prompts, collaboration logic in one file.

items.name: Tree Data Model
items.description:
**4-Level Hierarchy**

```
Root (capexTree)
├── Phase (children[])
│   ├── Item (items[])
│   │   └── Subtask (subtasks[])
```

Node types: root, phase, item, subtask
Use subtitle/tags for semantic categorization.

items.name: Supporting Packages
items.description:
**packages/**
- treelisty-mcp-bridge/ - Claude Code integration
- treelisty-chrome-extension/ - Screen capture

**netlify/functions/**
- claude-proxy.js - API proxy
